dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sh.shipment_xid, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') start_time, sh.servprov_gid, (SELECT shs.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status shs WHERE shs.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND shs.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SECURE RESOURCES') resources, (SELECT shs.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status shs WHERE shs.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND shs.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE') enroute, (SELECT bsc.description FROM bs_status_code bsc INNER JOIN ie_shipmentstatus ies ON bsc.bs_status_code_gid = ies.status_code_gid WHERE ies.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ies.insert_date = ( SELECT MAX(ie.insert_date) FROM ie_shipmentstatus ie WHERE ie.status_code_gid = ies.status_code_gid AND ie.shipment_gid = ies.shipment_gid) AND rownum = 1 ) code_description FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_status ss ON sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid WHERE sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ss.status_value_gid != 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_ENROUTE' AND ss.status_value_gid != 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_COMPLETED' AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' AND (TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') > (TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr') - interval '14' day) AND TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') < (TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr') - interval '1' day)) ORDER BY sh.servprov_gid, sh.start_time

SELECT COUNT(1) "ROW_COUNT" FROM ( SELECT sh.shipment_xid, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') start_time, sh.servprov_gid, (SELECT shs.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status shs WHERE shs.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND shs.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SECURE RESOURCES') resources, (SELECT shs.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status shs WHERE shs.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND shs.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE') enroute, (SELECT bsc.description FROM bs_status_code bsc INNER JOIN ie_shipmentstatus ies ON bsc.bs_status_code_gid = ies.status_code_gid WHERE ies.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ies.insert_date = ( SELECT MAX(ie.insert_date) FROM ie_shipmentstatus ie WHERE ie.status_code_gid = ies.status_code_gid AND ie.shipment_gid = ies.shipment_gid) AND rownum = 1 ) code_description FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_status ss ON sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid WHERE sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ss.status_value_gid != 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_ENROUTE' AND ss.status_value_gid != 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_COMPLETED' AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' AND (TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') > (TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr') - interval '14' day) AND TO_DATE(sh.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') < (TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr') - interval '1' day)) ORDER BY sh.servprov_gid, sh.start_time
)
